sources.title: Special Agent K-7
sources.description: This obscure film from an obscure studio would be less boring if it featured a K-9 instead of a K-7.

sources.title: Special Agent K-7 (1937) GANGSTER
sources.description:
Stars: Walter McGrail, Queenie Smith, Irving Pichel 
Director: Bernard B. Ray

Agent K-7 finds himself knee-deep in a murder mystery at a posh nightclub run by a mobster.

metadata.Plot: (1937) Walter McGrail, Irving Pichel, Queenie Smith, Donald Reed. A fine poverty row thriller. Agent K-7 finds himself knee-deep in a murder mystery at a posh nightclub run by a mobster. Pichel is great as the smooth-talking lawyer with gangland ties. Who done it? Lots of guys in cool suits, gorgeous dames, and gangland patter. There's even a nifty musical number. 16mm.
metadata.Writer: Phil Dunham, Leslie Spiller, George Zimmer
metadata.Actors: Walter McGrail, Queenie Smith, Irving Pichel
